actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend subchapter 10 of chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, with respect to the rates of pay for levels II, IV and V of the Executive Schedule.

summary.text: Increases specified rates of pay for levels III, IV, and V of the Executive Schedule. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5314, 5315, and 5316).

titles.title: A bill to amend subchapter 10 of chapter 53 of title 5, United States Code, with respect to the rates of pay for levels II, IV and V of the Executive Schedule.
